name: "Odoru Monsutera" - I Could Have Done That #40/70
description:
"And all of a sudden the Monstera we picked up in Japan started dancing ... " #40 of the "I Could Have Done That" series. (Traits: Monstera Plants - 4/70). Don't you hate it when people look at art and say, "I could have done that!" :/ These are all 1-of-1 high-resolution scans of 70 simple acrylic paintings with a little animation made by me, Kris Kanaly (aka Pyramid Guy). All of the physical paintings have been collected. These are certified authentic NFTs minted by me. Only one copy will be minted of all 70 paintings. Follow me on Instagram: @pyramidguy. And check out my other cool project, the Galactibles™ at galactibles.xyz. For paintings in IRL: kriskanaly.com

“I Could Have Done That” Rarities:  |  Birds - 29 | Abstracts - 28 | Suns - 28 | Boats - 18 | Squiggles/Entrails - 14 | Adobe Houses - 7 | Two Waves - 7 | UFOs - 5 | Rainbow Waves - 5 | Caves - 4 | Monstera Plants - 4 | Cactus People - 3 | Just a Bird - 3 | People - 2 | 3D - 2 | Bloody Sea - 2 | Colored Dots on Blue - 2 | Portals - 2 | Castles - 1 | Eyes - 1 | Colored Dots on Red - 1 | Bloody Sky - 1 | Monstera Plants + Dots - 1 | Rainbow Drops - 1 | Rainbow Sprinkles - 1 | Wavy Rings - 1 | Mazes - 1 | Space - 3 | Pyramids - 1 |
